item.title: Fix Your Polybar Panel Icon
item.description: Polybar let’s you choose multiple fonts and sizes for your WM panel. So if you’re having issues with the size of icons/texts in your panel you can change the size individually. Let’s get to the point. How are you supposed to do that? You’ve to define which font you want to use and how you want to customize it’s value.
